author: Parikshit Mishra
title: Metaplanet Acquires 1,005 Bitcoin, Issues $208M Bonds for Further BTC Buys
description: Last week, the fifth largest corporate bitcoin holder, announced it is raising $515 million from capital raises.
content:
Metaplanet has bought 1,005 bitcoin
 pushing its total stash of the largest cryptocurrency to 13,350 BTC.The Tokyo-listed hotelier also announced it is issuing 0% interest rate ordinary bonds worth … [+392 chars]
